# isVideoStabilizationSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports video stabilization.

## Declaration

```swift
var isVideoStabilizationSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If the format supports video stabilization, you can enable it on an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureConnection] instance.
title: isVideoStabilizationSupported
